label: Visual Studio Premium 2013 Update 5 on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: Visual Studio Premium 2013 Update 5 on Windows Server 2012 R2
description: This image provides Visual Studio Premium 2013 Update 5 with Azure 2.8 on Windows Server 2012 R2.  Visual Studio Premium streamlines collaboration between all members of the development team.  Designed for efficient team development, it lets you adopt agile practices at your own pace, so your team can accomplish more, faster. The Visual Studio software is preinstalled in this VM, but you must acquire a Visual Studio subscription separately which allows you to sign in to and run Visual Studio on this VM.
